text: EXID was a five-member South Korean girl group. Its members are Solji, LE, Hani, Hyelin and Junghwa. They debuted on February 12, 2012 with the release of "Holla". The quintet released their first EP Hippity Hop in August 2012. It was met with limited success. Their 2014 single "Up & Down", however, reached number one on the Gaon Singles Chart four months after its release. They mostly became more famous after the fancam of the member " hani " which hits 10 Views on YouTube . EXID released their next mini-album Ah Yeah on April 13, 2015. The song of the same name "Ah Yeah" was its lead single. The single also was met with commercial success as it peaked at the runner-up position on the Gaon Singles Chart. ==Members== * Solji (), real name Heo Sol Ji () * LE (), real name Ahn Hyo Jin () * Hani (), real name Ahn Hee Youn () * Hyelin (), real name Seo Hye Lin () * Junghwa (), real name Park Jung Hwa () ==Discography== ===Albums=== * Street (2016) * Trouble (2019) * B.L.E.S.S.E.D (2020) ===EPs=== * Hippity Hop (2012) * Ah Yeah (2015) * Eclipse (2017) * Full Moon (2017) * We (2019) ==References== ==Other websites== * Kara Official Internet Cafe Category:2010s South Korean music groups Category:2012 establishments in South Korea Category:2020s disestablishments in South Korea Category:2020s South Korean music groups Category:2022 disestablishments Category:K-pop music groups Category:Musical groups disestablished in the 2020s Category:Musical groups established in 2012 Category:South Korean girl groups
title: EXID
